review.reviewBody: I ordered from them numerous times, usually the Meat Lovers and it's always great. Also, there prices are slightly lower then other establishments. The quality and quantity is great

Great punjabi style Pizza!. Much better than most in the area. The crust was well done and not too soft, which is how I like it. Good amount of toppings, and the quality was good. We've been ordering from here for years, and it was great to finally see them on Doordash.
The best pizza in Surrey is now on door dash. this is wonderful news
